description:
A bike is so much more than just a bike, help protect your piece of 2-wheeled freedom with this skookum U-lock. Utilizing a double-deadbolt design and a contoured locking interface, the Mini-7 is protected from standard 1-cut attacks, and highly resistant to twisting attacks. The included cable adds a little extra security to front wheels, seats, helmets, or anything else you want to loop it through. These extra features greatly increase the chances of your bike remaining right where you left it.

  • 13mm hardened shackle and double deadbolt design offers additional protection to leverage and twist attacks
  • 4ft. double looped cable extends to lock your wheels
  • Primary key has an LED light fob attached
  • Includes 2 replacement keys, covered by Kryptonite optional Key Safe Program for stress-free replacements
  • Double deadbolt design prevents twisting or one-cut attempts
  • Disc style cylinder is resists drilling or attempts to pick it
  • Flexframe-U bracket provides mounting options
  • Vinyl coating protects your bike’s paint
  • Dustcover keeps road grit out of your lock
  • Kryptonite rates this U-lock 7/10, and Sold Secure gives it a Gold rating
name: Kryptonite Evolution Mini-7 U-Lock w/Flex Cable
